title: V̇edic koṣa. v.1. With an elaborate introd. on the history of the Brāhmaṇa literature by Bhagavad Datta. Comprising a concordance of all the etymologies, meanings of Vedic works, attributes of different devatas, scientific and moral passages and other useful material contained in the 15 printed Brahmanas of the Vedas v. 1
author: Haṃsarāja, Vedic scholar.
